original_text: Then Satan entered into Judas called Iscariot, who was of the number of the twelve.
korean_text: 열둘 중의 하나인 가룟인이라 부르는 유다에게 사탄이 들어가니

sentences.original_text: Then Satan entered into Judas called Iscariot
who was of the number of the twelve.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 열두 제자 중 한 사람이었다
